data.title: First Polish patient wakes from coma due to brain stimulator implant

Muslims in Belgium call for coordinated response to ISIS activity. "We should answer [IS] ideology by ideology and [IS] education by education. We need to emphasize the good way of the religion, which is to build peace. ISIS exploits the verses of Koran in a wrong way and we need to tackle this "

Tanzania plans to spend 7 trillion shillings ($3.21 billion) over the next five years to connect about 1 million rural households to electricity. East Africa's second-biggest economy wants to use some of its natural gas reserves to end power shortages and boost industrial growth.

Huge fire in Madeira (Island in Portugal) has started threatening Funchal (the biggest city in the Island) and has already gotten to the historical center of the city. Thousands of lives at risk, 1200 firemen fighting the fire, the military have been called. Repost with english article.
